mapper.select: SELECT r.member_id as member_id, e.id as id, e.status_id as status_id FROM tb_equipments as e LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_entry_exit_record as r ON e.id = r.eq_id WHERE e.serial_no = #{serialNo} ORDER BY r.reg_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_entry_exit_record (eq_id, status_id, member_id) VALUE (#{eqId}, #{statusId}, #{memberId})
